document.full_text: u.s. market regulators on friday sued the former chief financial officer of a multibillion-dollar hedge fund founded by daniel zwirn, accusing him of improperly transferring $870 million between the fund's accounts.
document.title: sec sues ex-zwirn fund cfo for cash transfers
lines_and_colors: u.s. market regulators on friday sued the former chief financial officer of a multibillion-dollar hedge fund founded by daniel zwirn, accusing him of improperly transferring $870 million between the fund's accounts.
